= Project =

Purpose of the project is to create light version of functional and clock-precise simulators of a microprocessor optimized for digital signal processing (DSP). 

This project is a part of Intel Lab activity at Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (MIPT).

= Team =

Our team consists of a group of students of MIPT and mentors who supervise and direct the team's operation.
